https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gboWlUSjCJ225xibC0zfo1JAq1Y.jpg In a school in Extremadura in a town called Arroyo de la Luz, the teacher shows children of about ten years the subtitled Kiarostami film "Where is my friend's house?" and makes them reflect on the moral dilemma about friendship and obedience posed by the film Arroyo de la luz
